thread.title: New at This Year’s Tribeca Film Festival: A Piece of Live Theater

author: Charles Passy
title: New at This Year’s Tribeca Film Festival: A Piece of Live Theater
text:
At this year’s Tribeca Film Festival, attendees have their pick of more than 100 films, television programs and streaming shows.
But those who go to the screening this Saturday afternoon of the quirky documentary “Bathtubs Over Broadway” will see something beyond the picture itself. They will also take in the equivalent of a live mini Broadway-style show.
The...
